messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

annual refresher quiz error after completing the survey re reminder annual refresher quiz can your started attempt but show any question responses also needs be checked answered questions seems application stored answers others might be facing same issue too sent wednesday reminder annual refresher quiz hi would you please investigate thanks sent wednesday re reminder annual refresher quiz afraid can your started attempt but show any question responses you have start again can explain why origin closed connection think you should forward message below case can find out more about you probably know content maintained by we use make access some web properties more efficient kind regards sent re reminder annual refresher quiz hi after answered final question got error suspecting need start over again error request could be satisfied origin closed connection generated by request id sent wednesday reminder annual refresher quiz information awareness quiz reminder dear kind reminder about below sent mailbox information compliance officer or below safe also if you member last paragraph then come back here rest dear please below before proceeding we kindly invite you participate information awareness annual refresher quiz link id we asking existing employees have taken information awareness quiz past year since st december fact take quiz demonstrate their continued awareness important information practices obligations over includes members rest senior you alone being invited quiz contains questions be drawn random larger pool everyone attempting quiz receive slightly different set questions answer if you repeat test second subsequent re tests contain slightly different set questions attempt each other end quiz you be asked confirm you have understood acceptable use policy you agree comply with policy clients expect we re obtain acknowledgement every employee annually we appreciate taking quiz consuming but we have commitment our clients ensure employees have received tested regular information awareness reminders you have seen regular bulletins sent out by information quiz designed test your awareness provide with evidence present clients ask demonstrate we provide test these awareness reminders participation pass rates for quiz be included monthly information report delivered board directors your participation quiz does have very senior attention if you want remind yourself important information policies obligations we must comply with you can view information awareness induction training movie minutes here resource content awareness october engineering cryptographic awareness movie here id intellectual rights data cartoon here id there some reminders for busy readers here you can also acceptable use policy you ll also find links other key policies including information classification policy handling guidelines summary roles responsibilities if you manager please ensure you remind your members importance taking quiz if receive invitation take joiners since st december receive invitation finally if you member or if you configured or trainer for any reason please follow these specific instructions set your effective status trainee temporarily before attempting take refresher quiz otherwise your score be recorded main quiz results we think you have taken quiz we ll continue you take quiz thanks kind regards information
